info.name: Custom Site Chat - API Tests
info.description:
Comprehensive API tests for Custom Site Chat application.

Test flow:
1. Health Check
2. User Registration
3. Email Verification
4. Login
5. Collection Management
6. Document Upload & Management
7. Query API
8. User API
8.5. Analytics API (NEW)
9. Cleanup
10. Error Handling
